skillTree.localised_description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
Having spent much of his time delving through archaic crypts and ruined temples, Rodrik has a keen eye for valuables.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having spent most of his time living in the jungle, this feels like home.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(all units in army)

Double experience gain for units when fighting against Lizardmen
	(all units in army)
When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Knight's skill, prowess, and finesse with blade and lance are beyond compare; his bravery, horsemanship, and chivalry above all others.
Most loyal of Companions, this Knight fights always at the side of his Liege.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Knight units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In the glory of the charge is this Knight most alive, ever in the forefront of battle.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A master of the feint and riposte, this Knight's skill at turning an enemy's strength against them is legendary.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: So great is this Knight's skill with a lance that none can unhorse them.

effects.description:
Replenishes 5% campaign movement range after winning a battle
	(own army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Steeled by this Knight's bravery, those around them fight with the courage of the Breton himself.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: With a heart of stone and resolute temper this Knight stands unbowed, spilling the foe's blood with each sweep and thrust.
Unbending even in the face of the greatest beasts, this Knight mounts their heads on the wall of his feasting chamber.
A hermit-Knight, this one nevertheless always returns to fight for his beloved king.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 when fighting against armies that spread corruption
	(own army)

Melee attack: +5 when fighting against armies that spread corruption
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Knight has great contempt for those who eschew the martial values of meeting one's opponent face to face.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Witnessing other friendly units rout will only affect this unit's leadership if they also have the Contempt attribute.
